trans-unit.source: Declares a mapping between a uniform resource identifier (URI) and a prefix.

To declare a mapping between a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] and a prefix, create an <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlNamespaceMapping> class and add it to an <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlNamespaceMappingCollection> object that is used as the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.XmlNamespaceManager%2A> for a binding.
trans-unit.target: Pour déclarer un mappage entre un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] et un préfixe, créez un <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlNamespaceMapping> de classe et l’ajouter à un <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlNamespaceMappingCollection> objet qui est utilisé comme le <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.XmlNamespaceManager%2A> pour une liaison.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.XmlNamespaceMapping" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.XmlNamespaceMapping" /> class.
The prefix to use in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)].
The <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> of the namespace to create the mapping for.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.XmlNamespaceMapping" /> class with the specified prefix and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].
The instance to compare for equality.
Returns a value that indicates whether this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.XmlNamespaceMapping" /> is equivalent to the specified instance.
<see langword="true" /> if the two instances are the same; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
Returns the hash code for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.XmlNamespaceMapping" />.
The hash code for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.XmlNamespaceMapping" />.
The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.XmlNamespaceMapping" /> object to compare.
The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.XmlNamespaceMapping" /> object to compare.
Performs equality comparison by value.
<see langword="true" /> if the two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.XmlNamespaceMapping" /> objects are the same; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlNamespaceMapping.Equals*?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: La méthode équivalente pour cet opérateur est <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlNamespaceMapping.Equals*?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.XmlNamespaceMapping" /> object to compare.
The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.XmlNamespaceMapping" /> object to compare.
Performs inequality comparison by value.
<see langword="true" /> if the two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.XmlNamespaceMapping" /> objects are not the same; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The equivalent method for this operator is the negation of <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlNamespaceMapping.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: La méthode équivalente pour cet opérateur est l’opposé de <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlNamespaceMapping.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the prefix to use in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)].
The prefix to associate with the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Le préfixe à associer à la [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string("").
trans-unit.target: La valeur par défaut est une chaîne vide ("").

trans-unit.source: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> of the namespace for which to create a mapping.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the namespace.
The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: La valeur par défaut est <see langword="null" />.
